info.title: Plan Scheduler API
info.description: OpenAPI specification for plan-scheduler service defining the PlanStatusMessage contract for Pub/Sub status publishing.

PlanStatusMessage.description: Message schema for plan status updates published to Pub/Sub. This schema is used by spec-compiler to publish status events that are consumed by plan-scheduler.

plan_id.description: Unique identifier for the plan execution

spec_index.description: Zero-based index of the spec within the plan

status.description: Current status of the spec execution

timestamp.description: ISO8601 timestamp when the status update occurred

error_code.description: Optional error code when status is 'failed'

error_message.description: Optional error message providing details when status is 'failed'

plan-status.name: plan-status-updates
plan-status.description: Pub/Sub topic for publishing plan status updates. Messages must conform to PlanStatusMessage schema.
